1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 import sys
3 import rospy
4 import rospkg
5 sys.path.append(rospkg.RosPack().get_path('ros_robotic_skin'))
6 from scripts.controllers.PandaController import PandaController # noqa: E402
7 
8 COMMAND_SWITCHING_TIME = 5
9 POSITION1 = [0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0]
10 POSITION2 = [1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0]
11 VELOCITIES = [0.5, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0]
12 ACCELERATIONS = [0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0]
13 
14 if __name__ == '__main__':
15  i_joint = 1
16 
17  if len(sys.argv) > 1:
18  i_joint = sys.argv[1]
19 
20  if len(sys.argv) > 2:
21  POSITION1 = float(sys.argv[2])
22  if len(sys.argv) > 3:
23  POSITION2 = float(sys.argv[3])
24 
25  # rospy.init_node('periodical_position_publisher', anonymous=True)
26  controller = PandaController()
27 
28  curr_pos = 1
29 
30  now = rospy.get_rostime()
31  while not rospy.is_shutdown():
32  dt = (rospy.get_rostime() - now).to_sec()
33 
34  if dt > COMMAND_SWITCHING_TIME:
35  positions = POSITION1 if curr_pos == 1 else POSITION2
36  controller.publish_trajectory(positions, VELOCITIES, ACCELERATIONS, None)
37  now = rospy.get_rostime()
38  curr_pos = 2 if curr_pos == 1 else 1
